sys_script_email.name: test_invite_user_firstname

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_email_ede39e1807ded01037c7f2ae7c1ed00a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>test_invite_user_firstname</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[(function runMailScript(/* GlideRecord */ current, /* TemplatePrinter */ template,
          /* Optional EmailOutbound */ email, /* Optional GlideRecord */ email_action,
          /* Optional GlideRecord */ event) {
	var recipientName = 'User';
	var recipientId = event.parm1;
	
	var userGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	userGr.addQuery('sys_id', recipientId);
	userGr.query();
	if(userGr.next()) {
		recipientName = userGr.getValue('first_name');
	}
	template.print(recipientName);
})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jaydeepdeb</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-07-25 09:01:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>ede39e1807ded01037c7f2ae7c1ed00a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>test_invite_user_firstname</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Arena" source="x_93700_arena">661460dfdbc5c010b6db8e47489619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Arena">661460dfdbc5c010b6db8e47489619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_ede39e1807ded01037c7f2ae7c1ed00a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jaydeepdeb</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-07-25 09:29:38</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>
